column1: Traffic reports will resume Tuesday August 27 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD:
column4: The outer loop is shut down at Old Paris Rd due to a serious collision involving a motorcyclist at N Broadway.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD:
column4: Motorists should avoid the outer loop of New Circle Rd in the area of Old Paris Rd if possible.
